name: @kui-shell/plugin-editor
description: Kui plugin that integrates the monaco-editor component
author: Nick Mitchell

scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && tar -C ../../build/plugins/$(basename `pwd`)/src --exclude test --exclude node_modules -cf - . | tar -C dist -xf - && find dist -type l -exec rm {} \; && cp -a dist/* .
scripts.postpack: for i in dist/*; do if [ -d $i ]; then for j in $i/*; do rm -rf ./`basename $i`/`basename $j`; done; else rm -rf ./`basename $i`; fi; done && rm -rf dist
